briefTitle: Study of PEG-Intron Plus REBETOL in Pediatric Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C (Study P02538 Part 1)
officialTitle: Assessment of the Safety, Efficacy, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of PEG-Intron® Plus REBETOL® in Pediatric Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C
summary: The primary objective is to assess the safety, efficacy and tolerability of the combination of PEG-Intron plus REBETOL in pediatric subjects with chronic hepatitis C. The secondary objective is to measure the multiple-dose pharmacokinetics of PEG-Intron and REBETOL in pediatric subjects with chronic hepatitis C.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With a Sustained Virologic Response (SVR) at 24 Weeks Post-treatment
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to 48-week treatment duration. Follow-up of 24 weeks.
